custom-action.name: prometheusmonitoring
custom-action.description: The PrometheusMonitoring Action will get metrics from Prometheus. Possible parameters are: - PrometheusHost (required): The Prometheus host or ip Default value is "Your prometheus end point". - PrometheusPort (required): Dynatrace ID (section of your Dynatrace saas url). Default value is "80". - NeoLoadJsonMetricFile (required): Path to the file describing the metrics to query Default value is "${NL-CustomResources}/yourjsonfile.json". - NeoLoadProxy (optional): Proxy named defined in the NeoLoad settings Default value is "proxy name defined in NeoLoad settings". - NeoLoadDataExchangeApiKey (optional): Dataexchange API key defined in NeoLoad Default value is "Dataexchange API key defined in NeoLoad". - Tracemode (optional): Tracemode will enable logging of the api calls done agains prometeus. Value possible : True /False Default value is "False".
